nodes.text: The Republic Ambassadorial Corps was an organization within the Galactic Republic that was active shortly prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The Eta-class shuttle was designed for use by the Republic Ambassadorial Corps as well as the Galactic Senate as a VIP transport.

The Republic Ambassadorial Corps was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
